column4: i need help when x starts i see a black screen with the mouse cursor. it was working previously then i added something to the startup session commands and now i cant login. what do i do
ctrl-alt-f2 and then undo what you did =]
those are buttons on your keyboard
you are right it does. that will enable you to undo the changes you have made
seems you have ignored the one person trying to help you
what does the screen say after you press ctrl-alt-backspace?
